page.title: 17A Day at School.
page.content: On{Mondays}I usually get up at 07.05.I often have breakfast at 08.00 then I get dressed. We set off to school at 08.45.We write our television notes first thing then we normally do maths then we have assembly .In the middle of playtime we come in and watch our{television {programme}called Zig-Zag afterwards we do our{writing}to do with the programme. We have our dinner from 12.00-13.15 .I stay for dinner.In the afternoon we do sewing or finish our writing. I go home at 15.30. I get home at about 15.45 then I go to{dancing. Dancing starts at 17.00 we do tap first then ballet.When I get home I have my tea.Afterwards I watch the television programme Fame.I go to bed at 20.30.{
